text:
RT @BradBiggs: ICYMI

Apparently, Mitch Trubisky draws inspiration from a famous Teddy Roosevelt speech. 

Preparing for his fight to remain the #Bears starting QB, he came across authentic and confident even if, at least in my eyes, odds are against him.
